article.title: Why I love the Cloud
article.author: Sushil Buragute
article.excerpt: My take on why everyone should learn the cloud and be empowered by it!

authors.bio: Currently I'm working on procuring depth in ReactJS, Javascript and then moving onto learning NodeJS and databases. You can check out my Projects and Blogs below and connect with me on my social networks!
authors.name: Sushil Buragute
